about_the_game:
Greetings, fellow Villagers!
Our Supporter Pack is meant for people who are really into Grimmwood, or who simply enjoy amazing artwork and atmospheric, medieval/fantasy themed music. Or both :)
Either way, by buying the Grimmwood Supporter Pack, you will be supporting a game that dares to stray from the “path well-travelled”. And for that you have our deepest gratitude!
The Supporter Pack contains:

  • The original soundtrack of the game, containing all 7 tracks in high (uncompressed) quality.
  • Over 50 pages of Grimmwood art, including never before published concepts and images (in PDF format).

Grimmwood OST Tracklist:
1. This is Our Home (the Village theme)
2. Danger Lurks
3. Grimmwood - Main Theme
4. It's Getting Dark
5. Kill Or Be Killed
6. Wander the Forest
7. You Are Not Alone
